item.title: Add subscripts and superscripts to ggplot axis titles
item.description: Temperature superscript bquote("Temperature (" * "" ^o * "F)") Natural gas superscript bquote("Natural gas (" * "m" ^3 * ")") Carbon dioxide subscript bquote("CO" * "" [2])
